text: @RyanAFournier Today I started laughing my ass off, watching the news, because they said: Distilleries, instead of making alcohol for drinking are now being asked and have started to make hand sanitizers! Ha ha ha ha ha! See, I TOLD YOU SO! ALCOHOL IS A CURE FOR CORONAVIRUS, HANDS THROAT LUNGS!
